widget.header: Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

description: Hello everyone, my name is Noelia Méndez, or simply Nóe. I'm 21 years old, and I am from the port of Manzanillo, Colima. I just graduated from Computer Systems Engineering. I am focused on front-end development. I am curious and a bit of an extrovert. I don't give up too easily, and I hate leaving things incomplete. I love dancing, singing, laughing, and enjoying every day of my life. I am not afraid to ask for or give help.

Hi everyone, my name is Ana Aguilar. I'm 32 years old, I'm from Saltillo, Coahuila, and I’ve been working on IT for about ten years in different areas: programming, project management, and support. I enjoy reading and baking in my free time. I firmly believe that spending time with the people we love and taking time for self-care is a big part of a balanced life. I look forward to starting this new journey and working with you all.
